vote.title: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to increase the service contract with Conduent State & Local Solutions, Inc. for parking citation and collection system for the Department of Transportation - Not to exceed $760,374, from $5,627,200 to $6,387,574; and (2) the ratification of $461,426 for the Department of Transportation to pay outstanding invoices for parking citation and collection system - Total not to exceed $1,221,800 - Financing: General Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to increase the service contract with Conduent State & Local Solutions, Inc. for parking citation and collection system for the Department of Transportation - Not to exceed $760,374, from $5,627,200 to $6,387,574; and (2) the ratification of $461,426 for the Department of Transportation to pay outstanding invoices for parking citation and collection system - Total not to exceed $1,221,800 - Financing: General Fund
